summary: Novel Optimized Interchain Rebalancer - NOIR's Perpetual Yield Engine allows users to take long or short positions on a wide range of assets using isolated margin accounts. The Cross-Chain Yield Reactor aggregates liquidity from various protocols and blockchains, including Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, and Solana. The protocol incorporates advanced risk management tools and circuit breakers to mitigate risks and protect funds.
